name: ArtyGeek
tagline: User Experience, Product Design, Web Development
description:
Artygeek helps enterprises​​​​ and startups​​​ to design and launch successful digital products in Retail, Fintech, Healthcare, and Saas. We cover full SDLC and help with high-quality resources. 
Our Services:
- Product Conceptualization (Design Thinking Process)
- MVP development   
- Web Applications Development
- Mobile Applications Development
- Client-Server Applications Development
- Product strategy 
How do we work?
  Dedicated team
The flexible team built to your requirements
Adjustable scope, cost, and timeline
Project team flexible to meet changing requirements and budgets
Employee service cost covered by Artygeek   
  Full Cycle Product Development (Outsourcing)
Product Conceptualization

No supervision required from your side

We use design thinking and system approach to drive positive changes in human experience interacting with digital products.
